Package com.github.m5rian.jdaCommandHandler.commandServices

Interface IPermissionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultCommandService
public interface IPermissionService
Author:
Marian Interface for roles.

    • permissions

      static final java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends Permission>,​Permission> permissions

  • Method Details

    • registerPermission

      default void registerPermission​(Permission permission)
      Register a permission.
      Parameters:
      permission - The permission to register.

    • registerPermission

      default void registerPermission​(Permission... permissions)
      Register multiple permission with one method.
      Parameters:
      permissions - The permission to register.

    • unregisterPermission

      default void unregisterPermission​(java.lang.Class<? extends Permission> permission)
      Remove a registered permission.
      Parameters:
      permission - The permission to unregister.

    • unregisterAllPermissions

      default void unregisterAllPermissions()
      Removes all registered permissions.

    • getPermission

      @Nullable default Permission getPermission​(java.lang.Class<? extends Permission> clazz)
      Parameters:
      clazz - A class, which implements Role.
      Returns:
      Returns a class, which implements the Role interface as Role. This can return null if the class is not in the map.

    • getPermissions

      default java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends Permission>,​Permission> getPermissions()
      Returns:
      Returns all registered permissions as a HashMap.

    • hasPermissions

      default boolean hasPermissions​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Member member, java.lang.Class<? extends Permission>... permissions) throws NotRegisteredException
      /** Checks if a member is allowed to execute the command.
      Parameters:
      member - The author, who executed the command.
      permissions - The permissions the member needs to execute the command.
      Returns:
      Returns if the member can execute the command.
      Throws:
      NotRegisteredException - Is thrown when the provided permission isn't registered in a CommandService
